Key Match Events: Schranz scored for Slovakia in the 7th minute
Mangala received a yellow card in the 29th minute
Tielemans received a yellow card in the 76th minute
Lukebakio received a yellow card in the 85th minute
Schranz received a yellow card in the 41st minute
Pre-Game Insights: Belgium is on a 17-match unbeaten streak heading into the fixture against Slovakia
Belgium has not lost a single game since Domenico Tedesco's appointment as head coach
Belgium is the clear favorite to prevail from a group that also features Romania and Ukraine
Miscellaneous Highlights: Belgium and Slovakia have only met three times in their history, all friendly internationals
Belgium won their last encounter against Slovakia 2-1 in 2013
